definition: to keep/to contain/to suck (keep in your mouth without chewing)

sentences.english: I’ve been doing this job for 28 years and this brought a tear to my eye.

definition: to remain silent/to have nothing to say/(coll.) speechless/dumbfounded
to despair/to give up all hope/desperate/desperation
tears of blood (symbol of extreme suffering)/blood and tears
to clap one's hands/to clap each other's hands/high five
to grieve/to be broken-hearted/to feel deeply hurt
